| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 103|Polyhedron #103]]
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Amaunator]] 
| style="text-align: center;" |Amaunator was the [[Netherese]] [[The sun|solar]] deity of order, the sun, law, and time.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|103/Forgotten Deities: Amaunator}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 104|Polyhedron #104]]
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Karsus]] 
| style="text-align: center;" |The plight of Karsus the eternal proves even a god can fall on black days.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|104/Forgotten Deities: Karsus}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 106|Polyhedron #106]]
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Ibrandul]] 
| style="text-align: center;" |Ibrandul, “God of the Dry Depths,” is one of the greatest reasons to be afraid of the [[Underdark]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{posup|106/Forgotten Deities: Ibrandul}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Polyhedron 107|Polyhedron #107]]
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Moander]]
